clang++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX15.0.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=14.6 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/helloTexture.dir/src/helloTexture.cc.o -o helloTexture   -L/Users/fanglee/Notes/LearnOpenGL/lib  -L/opt/homebrew/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/Users/fanglee/Notes/LearnOpenGL/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib -lglfw3 -lglm -lassimp -lfreetype libGLAD.a libSTB_IMAGE.a third_party/imgui/libIMGUI.a -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework OpenGL -framework CoreVideo
